parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> **NodeId** is required when specifying a sharded cluster instance ID

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The data granularity of the performance metrics in seconds. Valid values: 5, 30, 60, 600, 1800, 3600, and 86400.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description:
The performance metrics. For more information, see [Metrics](~~216973~~).

> To specify multiple metrics, separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of a mongos or shard node in the sharded cluster instance. This parameter lets you query the performance of a single node.

> Available only when **DBInstanceId** is set to the ID of a sharded cluster instance.

parameters.name: ReplicaSetRole
parameters.description:
The role of a node in a standalone or replica set instance. Valid values:

- **Primary**: The primary node.

- **Secondary**: A secondary node.

> * Available only when **DBInstanceId** is set to the ID of a standalone or replica set instance.
>
> * If **DBInstanceId** is set to the ID of a standalone instance, this parameter only supports the value **Primary**.

parameters.name: RoleId
parameters.description:
The role ID of a node in a standalone or replica set instance. To query the role ID, call the [DescribeReplicaSetRole](~~62134~~) operation.

> Available only when **DBInstanceId** is set to the ID of a standalone or replica set instance.

parameters.name: SearchId
parameters.description:
The Search node ID.

> Available only after the Search feature is enabled for the instance.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
